title: ABBA (bozza)
subtitle: An overview of the most popular pop band of all the time.

dynamic_elements.table_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?song ?songLabel (year(xsd:dateTime(?publicationDate)) as ?publication) 
WHERE { ?song wdt:P175 wd:Q18233 ;
              wdt:P407 wd:Q1860 .
       ?song wdt:P577 ?publicationDate . 
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".} }
ORDER BY ?publicationDate 
LIMIT 20

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?label)  (COUNT(?label) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q215380 . # musical group
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q34 . # from sweden
     ?band wdt:P2031 ?date . # formation year         
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?count ?date
ORDER BY ?label
LIMIT 50

SELECT DISTINCT ?label
WHERE { wd:Q18233 wdt:P737 ?influencer . 
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". ?influencer rdfs:label ?label. } }
GROUP BY ?label
